Democratic presidential candidate, Hillary Rodham Clinton, right, hugs Democratic National Committee (DNC) Chair Rep. Debbie Wasserman Schultz, D-Fla. before addressing the summer meeting of the Democratic National Committee, Friday, Aug. 28, 2015, in Minneapolis. Democratic presidential candidate, Hillary Rodham Clinton, addresses the summer meeting of the Democratic National Committee, Friday, Aug. 28, 2015, in Minneapolis. Democratic presidential candidate, Hillary Rodham Clinton, gestures as she addresses the summer meeting of the Democratic National Committee, Friday, Aug. 28, 2015, in Minneapolis. MINNEAPOLIS (AP)  Here are the latest developments Friday from the Democratic National Committee meeting in Minneapolis, where four Democratic presidential candidates are addressing the party.
Author: [The Associated Press]
Title: [The Latest: Sanders says party needs huge voter turnout]
